_documentation.resorts: List of resorts to scrape. Each resort is scraped automatically when running ski-scraper.js

fields.key: Unique identifier for the resort (used for folder names in data/)
fields.name: Display name of the resort
fields.terrainUrl: URL to the terrain and lift status page (required for trail/grooming data)
fields.snowReportUrl: URL to the snow and weather report page (optional, enables snow data scraping)

_documentation.adding_resorts: To add a new resort: 1) Add entry to resorts array, 2) Run scraper - data folders are created automatically

schedule.comment: Scraper runs at 7 AM MST (2 PM UTC winter / 1 PM UTC summer DST)

season.comment: Format: MM-DD. Scraper will skip runs after this date each year.
